title: Kingdom of Lore
description: Young and fearless Princess Tarina must protect her kingdom from evil forces who wish to destroy it.
quote: Oh, snap! Looks like this ghost is gonna make us toast!
alt1: Princess Tarina faces off with a ghost whose emerald wand creates big green swirls in the sky
alt2: Princess Tarina and her bat companion look worried
alt3: the ghost reveals he is the King
alt4: Princess Tarina points her heart wand
